peril.views.slick.util

Class Clickable

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Menu, MiniMap, ScrollBar, SlickBoard, SlickContinent, SlickCountry, SlickPlayer, SlickUnit, VisualList

    public class Clickable
extends Viewable
    Encapsulates the behaviour of an Viewable object that can clicked by the mouse. This object wraps Region under a Viewable so that the object can be both seen and clicked.
    Since:
    2018-02-18
    Version:
    1.02.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Viewable, Region, Image

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Clickable()
      Constructs a empty Clickable item with no Region or image.
      Clickable(org.newdawn.slick.Image image)
      Constructs a new Clickable using an Image.
      Clickable(Region region)
      Constructs a new Clickable with no image.
      Clickable(Region region, org.newdawn.slick.Image image)
      Constructs a new Clickable with an image.

        public final int getWidth()
        Retrieves the width of the Region in this Clickable. If the Region is null this returns Viewable.getWidth().

      • isClicked

        public final boolean isClicked(Point point)
        Whether or not a mouse click at a specified Point will be inside this objects Region. If the Region is null then this will return false.
        Parameters:
        point - The Point position of the mouse.
        Returns:
        Whether the Region was clicked or not.

      • getPosition

        public final Point getPosition()
        Retrieves the Point position of this Clickable. If the Region of this Clickable is not null retrieve the Point position of the Region.
        Overrides:
        getPosition in class Viewable
        Returns:
        The Point of the Clickable
